name: 2D Madness
description:
Was made within a span of 3 days coming into the scene with no past experience for developing games or coding for that matter, encountered a bug which took me around half a day to fix and had already begun to start my project all over after I finally knew what it was... ":)".

This also leading up to me not finishing the game completely unfortunately, however, this was only to experiment and was made because I wanted to see what I could achieve in such short notice.

All around a profitable and fun experience and I'm looking to work on some bigger projects in the future.
